nodes.text: Alitra was a female Zabrak musician who performed with Alisia, Mako, O'choa Detera and Mestral in the cantina aboard Tansarii Point Station, playing the kloo horn in 1 ABY.

Alitra was a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. She could be found on the Tansarii Point Station, a tutorial station added to the game during the so-called "New Game Enhancements" of 2005.
